org.sontana.game

Class SceneManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sontana.game.SceneManager

  • public class SceneManager
extends java.lang.Object
    SceneManager handles the switching, loading, and referencing of Scenes.
    Author:
    Christophe Simon
